content: Quick nudge script for the final night push: “Hey [Name]! Micro-update: I just finalized X. I’m tackling Y by 10pm. If you see anything off in Z, please LMK—no pressure. Either way I’ll send a clean version by 11:30.”

Confidence reset micro-sequence: validate → mirror → give permission to pause → tiny next step. Example: “You’re doing all the right things. It’s normal to feel X after Y. Let’s park A for tonight and just send B—<60s job.”
